enchantment.condeb.dodge.desc: Has a chance to be immune to melee attack.
enchantment.condeb.nature_shade.desc: Immune to environment damage; Gain armor and armor toughness while in natural block.
enchantment.condeb.reap.desc: After the attack, if the target's health is equal to or lower than the attack damage, execute the target.
enchantment.condeb.stifle.desc: Execute small mobs or baby mobs.
enchantment.condeb.splash.desc: Deals a burst damage to mobs around the target.
enchantment.condeb.aftershock.desc: Append 25% damage for a certain number of times.
enchantment.condeb.civilization_apocalyp: Increases damage against villager, illager, witch and player.
enchantment.condeb.remelting.desc: Increases damage to fire-related mobs and on-fire mobs.
enchantment.condeb.sharpshot.desc: Deals extra damage to mobs not on the ground.
enchantment.condeb.aqua.desc: Arrows fired from the bow will deal Erosion.
enchantment.condeb.spring.desc: Causes Erosion when attack a mob, and breach the armor.
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.desc: Increases damage to aquatic mobs and in-water mobs.
enchantment.condeb.confusion.desc: Has a chance to cause Confusion.
enchantment.condeb.bind.desc: Has a chance to cause Bind.
enchantment.condeb.dissolve.desc: Causes the arrow to dissolve the hit block.
enchantment.condeb.fragile_curse.desc: Reduces your armor and armor toughness.
enchantment.condeb.fatigue_curse.desc: Reduces your mining speed and attack speed.
enchantment.condeb.sanctuary.desc: While holding by hand, increases 1 max health per level.
enchantment.condeb.specialty.desc: This item has a unique effect.
enchantment.condeb.temp_fire_aspect.desc: Same effect as the enchantment of the same name, but disappears when conditions are not met.
enchantment.condeb.temp_flame.desc: Same effect as the enchantment of the same name, but disappears when conditions are not met.
enchantment.condeb.temp_spring.desc: Same effect as the enchantment of the same name, but disappears when conditions are not met.
enchantment.condeb.temp_aqua.desc: Same effect as the enchantment of the same name, but disappears when conditions are not met.
death.attack.aftershock: %s did not survive the aftershock by %s
death.attack.aftershock.item: %s did not survive the aftershock by %s using %s
